charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was in a cave when
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw a light within...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1101_0200: And when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] walked toward that light...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_0400: What a coincidence, running into you here.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_0401_0600: A light...? Oh! I know what that was...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_0302_0700: I was walking toward a light...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_0402_0800:
Is that so? I believe I know what that might have
been.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_0900: You must have seen my Chandelure’s flames.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1000:
In a dark cavern like this, Chandelure’s flames do
catch one’s eye.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1200: Chandelure has always been of great help to me.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1300:
He gives his all on Unova’s Battle Subway, and
even when we’re battling...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1400:
We battle together, leading our challengers
toward an even higher state!
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1500:
Chandelure has always been a very dependable
Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1600:
He does well in Pokémon battles—and supports
me in other ways, too.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1700:
It’s a huge help to have him around when
traversing unlit places like this.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_1800:
And when I conduct inspections of the Battle
Subway or the minecart battle facility, he helps
by shining a light on what I’m working on.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_2000:
That reliable flame of his illuminates even the
darkest paths!
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_2100:
As long as Chandelure is by my side, I know that
even if we end up somewhere the light doesn’t
reach...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_2200:
we can still find a safe route and guide everyone
to their final destination!
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_0401_2400:
If you need to proceed through darkness, know
you can count on us!
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_0402_2700:
The reason why I am able to accurately determine
a route is because I have Chandelure by my side!
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_2800:
With his light, Chandelure can illuminate a path,
even where one did not previously exist.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_2900:
I am sure he will also shine a light upon the paths
I’m meant to take as well.
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_3000: That light will shine upon our destination...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_3100:
and when we come across people who have lost
their way...
charaepi_ch0108_10_nobori/2301_1201_3300:
That seems like a fair assessment, wouldn’t you
say?
